citation.case_name: Warner-Lambert Co. v. Wakefield, Individually and as Personal Representative, Trustee, and of the Estate of Wakefield

html:
544 U.S. 1044

WARNER-LAMBERT CO. ET AL.
v.
WAKEFIELD, INDIVIDUALLY AND AS PERSONAL REPRESENTATIVE, TRUSTEE, AND EXECUTOR OF THE ESTATE OF WAKEFIELD ET AL.

No. 04-1047.

Supreme Court of United States.

May 16, 2005.

1

Ct. Civ. App. Okla. Motions of Chamber of Commerce of the United States of America et al. and Pharmaceutical Research and Manufacturers for leave to file briefs as amici curiae granted. Certiorari denied.
